scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "yarn build:electron-dev && yarn dev:renderer" "node scripts/wait-and-start-electron.cjs"
scripts.build:electron-dev: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && tsc electron/main.ts --outDir dist-electron --target es2020 --module commonjs
scripts.build:electron: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && tsc electron/main.ts --outDir dist-electron --target es2020 --module commonjs && electron-builder
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "sleep 3 && node wait-for-dev-server.js && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && tsc electron/main.ts --outDir dist-electron --target es2020 --module commonjs && electron-builder
